Cookie Policy

How we use cookies to enhance your experience on our display distribution platform

Last Updated: March 1, 2025

About This Cookie Policy

This Cookie Policy explains how Lovosis Display Solutions, as official distributors of premium display technology, uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them when browsing our display catalog and distribution platform.

What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help our display product catalog function correctly and improve your browsing experience. As display distributors, we use cookies to remember your preferences, product interests, and help you navigate our extensive catalog of screens, monitors, and digital signage solutions.

Types of Cookies We Use

We use several types of cookies on our display distribution website: (1) Essential cookies necessary for basic functionality, (2) Preference cookies that remember your browsing preferences, (3) Analytics cookies that help us understand how visitors interact with our display catalog, and (4) Marketing cookies that help us deliver relevant display product information.

How We Use Cookies

As official display distributors, we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember which display technologies you've viewed, maintain shopping carts, process orders, and analyze traffic patterns. This helps us improve our website and provide personalized recommendations for display solutions that match your specific requirements and interests.

Third-Party Cookies

Our website includes cookies from trusted display manufacturing partners and analytics providers. When you browse specific display product categories or specifications, these cookies help us show you relevant information from our manufacturing partners. This facilitates a seamless experience when selecting and ordering display technology through our distribution channels.

Cookie Management

You can manage cookies through your browser settings. You can choose to block or delete cookies, though this may impact your browsing experience on our display distribution website. Some features related to product configuration, display specifications, and order processing may not function properly if certain cookies are disabled.

Cookie Duration

We use both session cookies that expire when you close your browser and persistent cookies that remain on your device for a set period. For display product configurators and pricing tools, we may use cookies that persist longer to remember your custom specifications and streamline future visits to our distribution platform.

Detailed Cookie Information

Category Purpose Duration Examples
Essential Website functionality, security, account access Session to 1 year
session_idcsrf_tokenauth_cookie
Preferences Remember display preferences and settings Up to 2 years
display_size_preferenceresolution_filterui_theme
Analytics Understand user behavior and improve site Up to 2 years
_ga_gidvisitor_id
Marketing Track across sites for relevant display ads Up to 2 years
_fbp_gcl_auads_conversion

Display Manufacturer Partner Cookies

As official distributors of display technology, our website includes content and cookies from our manufacturing partners. These cookies help provide accurate product information, warranty details, and technical specifications directly from the manufacturers:

Samsung Display
LG Commercial
NovaStar
Sony Professional
Philips Signage
Barco

Each manufacturer may set their own cookies when you view their specific product lines or technical documentation on our distribution platform. This ensures you receive the most current product information directly from the source.

Managing Your Cookie Preferences

You can manage or delete cookies based on your preferences through your browser settings. Below are links to instructions for managing cookies in popular browsers:

Google Chrome Mozilla Firefox Safari Microsoft Edge

Important Note for Display Distribution Clients

Disabling certain cookies may impact your ability to browse our product catalog effectively, configure display specifications, obtain accurate pricing, or place orders through our distribution platform. Features like saved product comparisons, screen configuration tools, and recent view history may not function properly without essential cookies.

Questions About Our Cookie Policy?

If you have questions about our cookie practices or would like more information, please contact our privacy team:

Email
privacy@lovosisdisplay.com
Phone
+1 (555) 123-4567
